column1: The '''Third Marshal of the Riddermark''' was the third of the three [[Riddermark|Marshals]] who commanded the forces of [[Rohan]]. Like the [[Second Marshal of the Riddermark]]
column2: the Third Marshal had no fixed duties
column3: and his role changed according to the needs of his King. At the time of the [[War of the Ring]]
column4: the Third Marshal was none other than [[Éomer]] son of [[Éomund]]
column5: whose base of operations was at [[Aldburg]] in the [[Folde]].<ref>{{UT|Isen}}
